fields.description:
Kitchensink is not working on blackberry 7.1.0.163,we just see the appcelerator splash screen.

Not a Regression, occurs with 2.0.2GA

Steps to reproduce:
1.Build kitchen sink for mobile web in titanium studio.
2.Type the ip address of your laptop into the mobile device's web browser.
3.Hit go or enter.
4.You will see that you just get the appcelerator splash & nothing goes ahead.
5.We do not get the kitchensink app.

Actual result:
1.We just get the appcelerator splash & nothing goes ahead.

Expected result:
1.We should see the kitchensink fireup with all the tabs & table rows.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Kitchensink is not working on blackberry 7.X & blackberry Playbook,we just see the appcelerator splash screen.
fields.environment:
Tested on :
Titanium Studio build:2.1.0.201206181944
SDK version:2.1.0.v20120608174150
Blackberry 7.1.0.163

comments.body: The reason KitchenSink is not loading on the Blackberry Bold is because "JavaScript execution exceeded timeout". This is a KitchenSink specific issue. It does not happen for "smaller" apps. This could be happening because of the slow speed of the device.

Kitchen sink does not work on blackberry 7.0.

Environment:
Titanium studio : 2.1.0.201206251749
SDK version : 2.1.0 GA
Blackberry Torch 9860 running blackberry OS 7.0

Verified using SDK version 2.0.2 GA.
The issue exists in 2.0.2 GA.

Mobile web is not working on blackberry playbook OS version:2.0.1.358

Tested On:
Titanium studio : 2.1.0.201206251749
SDK version : 2.1.0. GA
Resolving ticket as "Won't Fix" as MobileWeb is no longer supported.
